Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Timhotel Lyon La Part Dieu places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Parc de la Tete d'Or and Tete d'Or Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Oxygen Tower and Geriatric Hospital of Charpennes.

Rooms
Stay in one of 33 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and an elevator (lift).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Stay in one of 33 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at Timhotel Lyon La Part Dieu places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Parc de la Tete d'Or and Tete d'Or Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Oxygen Tower and Geriatric Hospital of Charpennes.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Parc de la Tete d'Or - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Oxygen Tower - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Geriatric Hospital of Charpennes - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Auditorium Maurice Ravel - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Part Dieu Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tour du Credit Lyonnais - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Espace Tonkin - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Espace Tete d'Or - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Tete d'Or Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Claude Bernard University - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Lyon Opera - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Transbordeur - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Interpol Headquarters - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Claude Bernard University Lyon 1 - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Lyon City Hall - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Lyon (XYD-Part-Dieu SNCF Train Station) - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Lyon (LYN-Lyon Bron) - 8 km / 5 mi
Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery) - 17.7 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for Timhotel Lyon La Part Dieu is Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
